short_summary: The tender closing date is 2024-01-12 and the expected contract start date is 2024-01-19. The selected bidder will supply height adjustable work surfaces, dual monitor arms, power modules, and wire management systems to office and bureaucratic teams
description: The selected bidder will supply 53 individual work surfaces, 53 dual monitor arms, 53 power modules, and 53 wire management systems to various offices. These equipment are namely: Individual Height Adjustable Work Surfaces , Dual Monitor Arm,  and Wire Management for office spaces.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Type**: Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
## Solicitation

* **Reference Number**: cb-685-25093226
* **Amendment Number**: 5
* **Contract Title**: R-155582 New Furniture
	+ **Procurement Category**: GD
	+ **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Traditional
* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-22
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-12T14:00:00 (14:00 EST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-01-19
* **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-02-23
* **Contract Status**: Expiré (Expired)

## Purchase Description

The [Shared Services Canada] (Services partagés Canada) is issuing a Request for Proposal for the purchase of new furniture items. The Scope of Work encompasses the supply of the following items:

* Individual Height Adjustable Work Surfaces (53 units)
* Dual Monitor Arm (53 units)
* Power Module (53 units)
* Wire Management (53 units)

## Proposal Evaluation Criteria

The proposal evaluation will be based on the combination of technical merit and price.

## Procurement Details

* **Delivery Location**: Manitoba and Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Daivya Aneja ( daivya.aneja2@ssc-spc.gc.ca )
	+ Phone: (343) 571-4316
* **Attachments**:
	+ Solicitation (English and French)
	+ Questions and Answers
	+ Amendment 1 (English and French)

Note: You can adjust and rephrase this rewritten output to better fit within the 400 words limit. However, be sure not to exclude any important details. Also, please let me know if this modified output meets your requirements before making any further changes.  Thank you.  Good day!
